name: Cursed (itch) (Lukas Vaiciunas)
description:
Created in two weeks for the One Minute Jam in November 2021

A witch has put a curse on you!

It is slowly draining your health, and you only have a minute to live.

There is only one cure...

Slay the witch!

Game engine developed in C++ using the Allegro 5 multimedia library.
